title: FericipXT-coated PEGylated rutile TiO2 nanoparticles in drug delivery: in vitro assessment of imatinib release
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23886-23901
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02439G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shilpy Bhullar, Navdeep Goyal, Shikha Gupta
Imatinib-loaded magnetically responsive PEGylated core : shell nanoparticles were synthesized using iron supplement. Sustained in vitro drug release was observed under acidic pH following Fickian diffusion and the Case II Relaxation mechanism.
